endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary overview of the user's utilities usage and account status.
Request detailed consumption history data for the user's utility services.
Set or update the user's consumption goals for better resource management.
Access a list of the latest billing statements and payment statuses.
Submit a payment for an outstanding utility bill.
Retrieve personalized energy-saving advice based on the user's usage patterns.
Update user preferences and notification settings for the service.
Access announcements and messages from utilities providers.
Remove previously set consumption goals for the user's account.
Request information on current or upcoming utility outages in the user's area.
